name: Chance (opening chapter only)
description:
‘Chance’ is an example of an opening chapter for an episodic romantic visual novel, much like the ones featured on mobile apps such as Maybe, Chapters or Choices.

 Though you were hoping for love, you weren’t expecting it to appear in your life to help you fix a tire. Or a second time, looking cute at a party. Torn between an old flame and a new stranger, you must figure out what your heart’s desire truly is.
